component.name: Router
component.description: Provides network connectivity between different subnets and networks.

component.name: Switch
component.description: Connects multiple devices within a local area network (LAN).

component.name: Wireless Access Point (WAP)
component.description: Provides wireless connectivity for devices within its range.

component.name: Firewall
component.description: Protects the network from unauthorized access and malicious attacks.

component.name: Server
component.description: Provides file sharing, web hosting, and other network services.
